entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Steinbach
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:17 AM CST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. High minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of light snow this morning. Wind north 30 km/h. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 40 this morning and minus 26 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Clearing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 26 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 18.
